content: this listing is for the tidepool rectangle tee crochet pattern pdf digital download only this is not a finished product this pdf tidepool rectangle tee crochet pattern is written in english using standard american terms it has been professionally tech-edited and is written in technical writing if you can crochet a rectangle you can make this breezy summer tee worked in two main pieces you ll find this a meditative and satisfying project to make by the pool or campfire follow the pattern as written or lean on the detailed instructions for customizing the length and fit to suit your style this shirt pattern is perfect for less experienced crocheters looking to make a stylish first garment or more advanced crocheters who want an easy satisfying project full step-by-step video tutorial included advanced beginner skills you ll practice include double_crochet meeting the pattern gauge and basic seaming this ad-free printable pdf includes a written pattern tutorial diagrams stitch chart and link to the detailed video tutorial yarn needed - category 3/dk weight such as lion brand 27/7 cotton dk or similar sizing/measurements - the flexible nature of this tee will accommodate many body types size // fits bust xs 30 s 34 m 38 l 42 1x 46 2x 50 3x 54 4x 58 5x 62 * see additional details in overall pattern notes to determine sizing yarn amount between 876-1 752 yards of a category 3 yarn depending on the size you make we recommend lion brand 24/7 cotton dk hook size size e 3 5 mm crochet hook ‍downloading - this listing is for the tidepool rectangle tee crochet pattern pdf digital download only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment ©️ copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind the creator of this pattern is not responsible for damages or costs that may arise from its use this pattern is intended solely for personal and non-commercial purposes no returns or refunds are available after download unauthorized reproduction distribution or sharing of this pattern including taking screenshots or reselling is expressly forbidden ❌ return policy -
